meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring on the transmitting end of a synapse.
meanings.sent1: The presynaptically active neuron sends signals to the next cell.
meanings.sent2: The presynaptically connected neurons communicate through chemical messengers.
meanings.sent3: The presynaptically excited neuron was eager to pass on its message.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked presynaptically, firing thoughts rapidly like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The presynaptically charged synapse buzzed with energy, ready to transmit information.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the transmitting neuron in a synapse.
meanings.sent1: The neuron fired presynaptically, preparing to send signals.
meanings.sent2: The neurotransmitters moved presynaptically towards the synaptic cleft.
meanings.sent3: He spoke presynaptically, getting his message across efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The information flowed presynaptically, smoothly and without delay.
meanings.sent5: The synapse functioned presynaptically, ensuring swift communication between neurons.
